snippet: This is only partly a question of when a child is ready for the death of Obi-Wan Kenobi. When do you produce something that captured your heart as a child and subject it to the scrutiny of the next generation?
abstract: This is only partly a question of when a child is ready for the death of Obi-Wan Kenobi. When do you produce something that captured your heart as a child and subject it to the scrutiny of the next generation?

headline.main: What's the Right Age to Appreciate 'Star Wars'?
